unnormalised: अरे यार! Geometry class again! I still can't figure out if cos 30 degrees is √3/2 or 1/2. Feels like my brain is doing a 360-degree spin daily. Teacher said "Pythagoras theorem is crucial", and I was like, "Crucial for passing, maybe?" My classmate Ramesh asked, "Sir, will there be word problems worth 10 marks?", classic Ramesh! Honestly, sometimes I feel like πr² is more relevant to pizza size than real-life calculations.
normalised: arre yaar! geometry class again! I still can't figure out if cosine thirty degrees is square root of three divided by two or one divided by two. feels like my brain is doing a three hundred and sixty degree spin daily. teacher said "Pythagoras theorem is crucial", and I was like, "crucial for passing, maybe?" my classmate Ramesh asked, "sir, will there be word problems worth ten marks?", classic Ramesh! honestly, sometimes I feel like pi r squared is more relevant to pizza size than real-life calculations.
